Description:

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC0300_OpenSessionCloseSession (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
078a0000000000000000000000000000
Pre Conditions:
Open TA1
Focus:
TA1 open TUI session and close TUI session.
Test Steps:
Call tlApiTuiOpenSession then tlApiTuiCloseSession from TA1. Do this scenario 100 times
Verification:
Check TA1 result must be RET_OK
Post Conditions:
Close TA1 Session

No
